resources.string: SELECT id, tweet_content, screen_name, name, created_at, profile_image_url FROM home
SELECT id, tweet_content, screen_name, name, created_at, profile_image_url FROM home WHERE id = ?
INSERT INTO home (id, tweet_content, screen_name, name, created_at, profile_image_url) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE home SET tweet_content = ?, screen_name, name = ?, created_at = ?, profile_image_url = ? WHERE id = ?
DELETE FROM home WHERE id = ?
DELETE FROM home
